short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that seamlessly empowers you with on-chain information while you browse the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Chainstalker ðŸ‘€, a go-to tool that empowers you with on-chain information seamlessly, right at your fingertips! Get a broader and deeper view of ENS, Lens, or 0x addresses that capture your interest while you routinely surf the web. 

Simply hover the mouse over any highlighted account, and a popup widget appears with a comprehensive on-chain details. This includes balances, crypto age, TX score, DeFi score, on-chain credentials, verification badges, GEO check-ins & PFP and more. It works both with addresses and crypto domains.

Key features:

âž¤ Discover on-chain activity insights and reputation of social contacts
âž¤ Explore and verify public addresses
âž¤ Know your collectors and creators
âž¤ Keep up with your friends and find new events with an implemented GEO Checkin via collected POAPs
âž¤ Spot Gitcoin and Worldcoin badge holders

Interesting fact: Chainstalker was built during the ETHGlobal Paris hackathon.

Social page for feedback and suggestions: https://twitter.com/chain_stalker
